core.name: Flying Comet
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Speed Boost: Team gains 25% Move Speed. MECH-type characters gain 14% Attack Speed.

subskills.name: Speed Boost
subskills.description: Team gains 25% Move Speed. MECH-type characters gain 14% Attack Speed.

core.name: Combo: Aerolite Impact
core.description:
Fires a Power Shot after 3 consecutive shots.
Power Shot: 350% ATK of Physical DMG to all targets in a straight line.

subskills.name: Comet Blast
subskills.description: Crit hits of Combo ATK have a 50.0% chance to stun enemies for 5s and inflict 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Nova Barrage
subskills.description: Combo ATKs additionally deals 296 Physical DMG against the target.

subskills.name: Falling Comet
subskills.description: When performing Combo ATKs, gain Ignore Interrupt and 60.0% DEF.

subskills.name: Shattering Blow
subskills.description: Breaking enemy shields stuns them for 4s, deals 100% ATK of Physical DMG, and inflict 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Critical Mastery
subskills.description: Gain 10.0% Crit DMG. Deal 50.0% more Crit DMG against frozen enemies.

core.name: Gungnir Fire
core.description:
Summons a Valkyrie heavy cannon to blast away at enemies before her.
Uncanny Cannon: Up to 1200% of ATK of Physical DMG.
SP Cost: 50

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impact
subskills.description: The last hit of the Ultimate stuns enemy for 5s and inflicts 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impulse
subskills.description: During Ultimate, tap [ATK] repeatedly to additionally deal 371 Fire DMG for each tap (max: 15 times).

core.name: Singularity
core.description:
Quickly cartwheels away to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Energy Black Hole: Triggers upon an Ultimate Evasion. Lasts for 2s, during which it pulls in enemies nearby. CD: 10s.

subskills.name: Star Sprint
subskills.description: After evasion or battle entry, gain 70.0% Move Speed for 4.0s. CD: 6s.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 3.0s.

subskills.name: Nova Collapse
subskills.description: Extends the duration of Energy Black Hole to 5.0s and expands the pull-in range by 6.0 meters.

core.name: Gyrodrive Kata
core.description:
Fire 4 shots in rapid succession.
1st Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Shot: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Shot: 150% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Shot: 250% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Concentrate Fire
subskills.description: Each repeated attack against the same target gains 2% ATK Speed (max: 35%). Effect resets if not attacking for 2s or switching targets.

subskills.name: Bleeding Shot
subskills.description: Crit hits of Basic ATK have a 80% chance to bleed enemies, dealing 40% ATK of Physical DMG every 0.5s for 10s and inflicting 2 Bleed Trauma. CD: 1s.

subskills.name: QTE: Meteor Shower
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers when an enemy is frozen, dealing 600% ATK of Physical DMG against a single target. Last hit of the QTE deals 400.1% ATK of AOE Physical DMG and impairs the target, reducing their DEF by 60% for 6s.
